import React from "react"; import { BrowserRouter as Router } from "react-router-dom"; import { Fa, SideNavCat, SideNavNav, SideNav, SideNavLink, Container, Row, MDBIcon } from "mdbreact"; import DocsLink from "../DocsLink"; class SideNavPage extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { isLeftOpen: false, isRightOpen: false }; } // Slide out buttons event handlers handleToggleClickA = () => { this.setState({ isLeftOpen: !this.state.isLeftOpen }); }; handleToggleClickB = () => { this.setState({ isRightOpen: !this.state.isRightOpen }); }; render() { // Because the toggling buttons are nearly identical, we create a function to render them: const createButton = (onClick, side) => { return (
); }; return ( {/* the buttons toggling visibility of SideNavs: */} {createButton(this.handleToggleClickA, "Left")} {createButton(this.handleToggleClickB, "Right")} {/* the left SideNav: */}
    • Submit listing Submit listing Registration form For bloggers For authors Instruction Monthly meetings FAQ Write a message     {/* the right SideNav: */}
    • Submit listing Registration form For bloggers For authors Instruction Monthly meetings FAQ Write a message     ); } } export default SideNavPage;
